dotnetType.name: BooleanDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BooleanSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new boolean deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BooleanSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a boolean deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BooleanDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
